section.SSBody:
Mihir Juvvadi Team Captain - Student leader of the team, oversees all of the functions of the team from the highest level

Jackson Waschura Team Manager - Second in command student leader, works in various team and shop functions

Randy Wu Business Manager - The external relations head of the team, communicates with sponsors, fund raisers, etc.

Joshua Chen Safety Captain - Oversees shop activities such as training and servicing, as well as other shop projects
